thread.title: Easybook Announces New Hassle Free Travel Booking Service from Brunei to Miri
thread.title_full: Easybook Announces New Hassle Free Travel Booking Service from Brunei to Miri

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook Announces New Hassle Free Travel Booking Service from Brunei to Miri
text:
Easybook.com , the entrepreneurial endeavor by the students of National University of Singapore is now one of the largest online ticket booking portal, providing easy and hassle free bus services from Brunei to Miri . The more frequent travellers have myriad options to choose from the local buses that ply from the Sultanate of Brunei to Miri, a small town in Northern Sarawak which is on Borneo, a small island in Malaysia. You can easily book your journey through Easybook without the need to stand in long queues fighting for tickets.
Easybook had its inception in the year 2005 with the aim to create express bus coaches tickets in the region. Since 2014, Easybook expanded its services to providing other land transport booking services like train tickets and car rentals. With its superior services at your disposal, Easybook has extended itself to five regional offices in Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Indonesia.
Easybook has proud associations with popular bus services in the region. It has partnership with the renowned PHLS express bus service which plys buses from Brunei to Miri. The PHLS express bus tickets are exclusively available on one of the most popular booking portal, Easybook. The joint venture of one of the oldest bus services Biaramas Express providing services to a wide group of customers providing them the best journey possible.
Easybook offers great discounts from time to time, assuring safety and security to the passengers along with a luxurious and comfortable journey.
Additional information awaits you in www.easybook.com .
